name: ibm-security-qradar-edr
label: IBM Security QRadar EDR
description: IBM Security QRadar EDR, formerly ReaQta, remediates known and unknown endpoint threats in near real time with easy-to-use intelligent automation that requires little-to-no human interaction.

fields.name: server_url
fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the Hive server URL to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.name: app_id
fields.title: App ID
fields.tooltip: Specify the App ID of the API Application already created in the Hive Server. For more information refer https://www.ibm.com/support/pages/node/6568259
fields.description: Specify the App ID of the API Application already created in the Hive Server. For more information refer https://www.ibm.com/support/pages/node/6568259

fields.name: secret_key

fields.description: Specify the Secret Key of the API Application already created in the Hive Server. For more information refer https://www.ibm.com/support/pages/node/6568259

fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. 
By default, this option is set as True.
